articles.author: Adam Hills
articles.title: The Ashes row proves elite sport is a cut-throat affair – the Lord’s chaps should applaud the Aussies
articles.description: England’s and Australia’s cricketers are elite athletes who must do whatever they can to win within the rules – even if some people don’t like it, writes Adam Hills
articles.content:
I normally keep my cricketing opinions to myself, but there was an incident during the most recent Ashes Test that I feel I need to comment upon and defend.

articles.author: Jai Bednall
articles.title: England finally admits the truth
articles.description: The Barmy Army didn’t enjoy listening to it, but two former players finally had an honest conversation about the current England cricket team after all the drama of the Second Test.
articles.content:

articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
